name: purefeed-extension
description: Clean up your social media feeds by hiding distracting sections and redirecting to focused content

scripts.clean: rm -f content-bundled.js popup-bundled.js manifest.json manifest-modular.json && cp popup-template.html popup.html
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run manifest && cp manifest-modular.json manifest.json && cp popup-template.html popup.html
scripts.add-platform: echo ' Just add your platform to config.json and run: npm run build'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.package:chrome: npm run prod && mkdir -p packages/chrome && cp manifest.json popup.html content-bundled.js popup-bundled.js packages/chrome/ && cp -r icons packages/chrome/ && cd packages/chrome && zip -r ../../purefeed-extension-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run prod && mkdir -p packages/firefox && cp manifest.json popup.html content-bundled.js popup-bundled.js packages/firefox/ && cp -r icons packages/firefox/ && cd packages/firefox && zip -r ../../purefeed-extension-firefox.zip .
scripts.package:all: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox

author: PureFeed Team
